name: UnderSmith
description:
---ABOUT---

UnderSmith is a 2D, casual, survival game where the player has to defeat all enemies in order to obtain more resources for the other player to craft weapons. The player can eliminate the enemies by smashing them with a weapon and then using the loots to create an even more powerful weapon. 

UnderSmith is a 2-player cooperative action game set in a post-apocalyptic
dystopian past. The story follows two brothers, Wilbert and Bacchus. They are the
descendants of the legendary blacksmith lineage.
They are working together to prevent the destruction of the forge in the old empire.
Both brothers who were trained by their grandfather in blacksmithing and
swordsmanship have to fight against waves of adventurers who wish to steal the
last remaining fusion core in the old empire ruins, unreasonable frenzied merchants
who are trying to get their hands on the strong equipments and random mobs of
monsters who were attracted to the noise of combat.
While one of the brothers is defending the forge from these waves, the other has to
concentrate on crafting weapons and armor. These crafted weapons and armor will
be used by the defending brother to fend of the waves.

---DEVS---
